mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expoverse.survey_user (loginid, userid, duration_sec, trigger_timestamp) VALUES (#{loginid}, #{userid}, #{duration_sec}, #{trigger_timestamp})
mapper.select: SELECT loginid FROM expoverse.survey_user WHERE userid = #{userid} and trigger_timestamp = #{trigger_timestamp}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expoverse.ques_fill (ques_id, loginid, filltext) VALUES (#{ques_id}, #{loginid}, #{filltext})
mapper.select: SELECT option_id FROM expoverse.survey_options WHERE ques_id = #{ques_id}

SELECT expoverse.survey_user.loginid,expoverse.survey_user.userid FROM expoverse.option_answers JOIN expoverse.survey_user ON expoverse.option_answers.loginid = expoverse.survey_user.loginid WHERE expoverse.option_answers.option_id = #{option_id}
SELECT option_id FROM expoverse.option_answers WHERE loginid = #{loginid}
SELECT filltext FROM expoverse.ques_fill WHERE ques_id = #{ques_id} and loginid = #{loginid}

SELECT expoverse.ques_fill.ques_id,expoverse.ques_fill.loginid, expoverse.ques_fill.filltext,expoverse.survey_user.trigger_timestamp FROM expoverse.ques_fill JOIN expoverse.survey_user ON expoverse.ques_fill.loginid = expoverse.survey_user.loginid ORDER BY expoverse.survey_user.trigger_timestamp DESC
